item.title: Addicted
item.description: [[songs/e/eluveitie/helvetios/meet_the_enemy.md#it-was-like-playing-ludus-latrunculorum-vyl-wnanory|Brother I am begging you]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/helvetios/meet_the_enemy.md#it-was-like-playing-ludus-latrunculorum-vyl-wnanory|Please don’t let this life destroy you]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/helvetios/meet_the_enemy.md#it-was-like-playing-ludus-latrunculorum-vyl-wnanory|You spend so much time hiding inside]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/helvetios/meet_the_enemy.

item.title: Ember Drive
item.description: [[songs/e/eluveitie/origins/celtos.md#in-the-west-he-rose-vyl-wnanory|The tears come strong again.]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/origins/celtos.md#in-the-west-he-rose-vyl-wnanory|I wasn’t ready for your time to end.]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/origins/celtos.md#in-the-west-he-rose-vyl-wnanory|I swear i’d tear this world apart to save you.

item.title: House Of The Rising Sun
item.description: [[songs/e/eluveitie/origins/king.md#i-am-the-crown-of-gallia-i-am-the-oak-in-the-nemeton-vyl-wnanory|There is a house in New Orleans]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/origins/king.md#i-am-the-crown-of-gallia-i-am-the-oak-in-the-nemeton-vyl-wnanory|They call the Rising Sun]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/origins/king.md#i-am-the-crown-of-gallia-i-am-the-oak-in-the-nemeton-vyl-wnanory|And it’s been the ruin of many a poor boy]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/origins/king.

item.title: No Saving Me
item.description: [[songs/e/eluveitie/origins/sucellos.md#the-times-surrender-sun-of-the-otherworld-vyl-wnanory|Inside these broken lines a disruption of our lives]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/origins/sucellos.md#the-times-surrender-sun-of-the-otherworld-vyl-wnanory|Insanity kicks in and all I see is another dead end]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/origins/sucellos.
